title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

THURSDAY OCTOBER 10, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

A work or volunteer project has been put on hold but that’s OK. It gives you extra time to think things through and calibrate your plans. Look within for extra guidance and inspiration.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

When it comes to a cherished hope or wish, make sure you tune into your inner voice today Taurus. It will help lead you towards your dreams in the quickest and most creative way.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 **

If you think you know how a loved one is feeling, then you may be way off the mark. And don’t believe everything you hear at work. A colleague, client or customer may be spinning you a yarn.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

The Moon’s in fellow water sign Pisces today. So creativity, compassion and spirituality are highlighted. But do your best to steer clear of confusing scenarios and complicated mind games.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

You’re keen to say what’s on your mind today Cats, as you connect with others on an emotional level, mix and mingle, communicate and chat. But avoid charging in and taking over.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Are you feeling stressed because you have to make an important decision? Don’t just listen to your logical side. Make sure you connect with your intuition, and listen to the advice of others.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 **

Have you been pulling your weight around the house? With Saturn and Pluto in your home zone, the more you resist domestic responsibilities, the more problems you’ll have with loved ones.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Things won’t run according to your grand plans, so try to be flexible and take things as they come today Scorpio. A confusing detour could end up leading you somewhere that’s truly inspiring.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Don’t rush financial matters Sagittarius. The stars encourage you to spend time thinking things through. If you surround yourself with family and friends, then you’ll have an enjoyable day.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

When communicating with others today, pay attention to what your intuition is telling you. When it comes to a cherished hope, dream or wish, Venus and Lady Luck are on your side.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

Aquarians don’t usually waste time dwelling on the negatives, but you may worry about a financial matter today. If you listen to the advice of an expert, then you’ll know what to do next.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

The Piscean Moon stimulates your creative and spiritual side; and helps you heed the wisdom of your inner voice. For some Fish, a trip that’s been on the backburner finally gets the green light.

YOUR DAY

The Moon’s in Pisces, which encourages plenty of compassion and creativity.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are prudent and precise but strive to get the balance right between your public and private lives. And don’t be too proud to ask for help when needed!

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
